text.sentence: Gentlemen, As you probably know, my brother Rich is jumping on the matrimonial hand-grenade this August 25.
To provide him with sage-like advice and help him prepare (in what may be called a double-vision quest) for his day of reckoning, my brothers and I are planning to take Rich on a pre-wedding retreat.
In all likelihood this weekend will be the last one of July (27-29), with the first one of August (3-5) as a backup date.
The locale will probably be Lake Travis outside of Austin (see www.bartoncreek.com for more information about accommodations).
Early morning golf, swimming, evening entertainment in Austin are the planned activities.
Certainly more information will be forth coming, but if joining Rich for this weekend is something you would be interested in doing, then please contact me.
My emails are tom_pastore@indianmountain.org and pastore@discovernet.net .
I hope to hear from you.
